Articles.Content:
So since MaceyDean is gone, I figure I can do something like it. I'll give credit to Macey for the names of the two sides, but everything else will be my own doing. Me and team.leit will be doing this.

You guys post ships here, I'll line them up, and have battles. You can choose which side they are on (Spiritwolf or Hanland)

Edited November 27, 2013 by zekes
*Ahem* free on weekends.Getting lathe will be easy.

*Ahem* free on weekends.Getting lathe will be easy.

ok, I already asked camulus, but we can have multiple people doing these battles!
I'll join in
This might turn into televised GNBC.
yes, except I'm just gonna take random ships from the Spiritwolf VS Hanland thread and use them with the permission of their builders, of course.
Hmm..,Seeing how anyone can use various ships I'll just watch and throw ships at the losing side:D

Hmm..,Seeing how anyone can use various ships I'll just watch and throw ships at the losing side:D

well each battle will be somewhat equal, but there will be some wins and some losses. I personally don't want to bring any of my ships into it, this is meant as purely a place to show a variety of ships in somewhat relaxed combat.
Wait...are you telling me you don't find combat relaxing.

Wait...are you telling me you don't find combat relaxing.

well, sometimes the aren't, when i'm losing and fighting to a draw... it's a bit stressful. But always fun.
Thank you for making this thread! I can finally see some of my ships in action!
I submit my Modular Cruiser D on the Side of Spiritwolf; The Kerbal Space Patrol and its Cruisers will forever fight for everlasting peace.
awesome! we need all the ships we can get for a nice varied battle
Have you thought of doing it with KMP? Realtime battles against other players.

awesome! we need all the ships we can get for a nice varied battle

You have my Vindicator-Class that you still need to armor. Finish it and you can use it in Battle Videos.
all my ship are in the blog/thread you can use all of them.... for spiritwolf of course...

I have a few ships that might be youtube worthy.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/star-nation-show-case/

Here is a showcase world of all my ships, if one or two look good I can try to get them to Laythe.

As for what side they battle for, that's leaning toward Spiritwolf.

Edited November 12, 2013 by iamonfire
When might we expect the first of these battles?
Probably this weekend, That's when Spartwo and i have time. We'll do the whole battle, then make a video and post it.
Oh no I said no shortly after,try Fleetmaster
Ok or camulus.

@@ YAY! this will be so amazing! I have my own ship(s) in the making that i would like to submit. they will come soon.

\_/
This would be a perfect thing to test Kerbal Multi-Player with. http://www.shacknews.com/article/81802/kerbal-space-program-multiplayer-mod-released
True. If setting up a server was remotely possible...

This would be a perfect thing to test Kerbal Multi-Player with. http://www.shacknews.com/article/81802/kerbal-space-program-multiplayer-mod-released

Why didn't you link to the thread on the forum?
